episodes.title: Slave
episodes.plot: Einar, a young man from northern England, lives with his mother and younger sister in a peaceful farming village. However, one day, the Vikings attacked the village, and Einar's life changed completely. Now, once again, the story of a true warrior (saga) begins in a turbulent era.

episodes.title: Ketil's Farm
episodes.plot: Entering a life of slavery, Einar and Thorfinn begin their work, while encountering the various figures who inhabit Ketil's farm.

episodes.title: Snake
episodes.plot: Thorfinn and Einar find themselves in a sticky situation with some vicious men claiming to be "warriors". Thorfinn is put in major danger as one of the men finds newfound excitement in making him beg for his life.

episodes.title: Awakening
episodes.plot: Following Fox's demonstration and Snake interfering, Einar makes ties in Thorfinn's actions and words, and confronts him on his past.

episodes.title: The Path of Blood
episodes.plot: After a sudden turn of events, young Canute must rise up to claim the throne of a Kingdom much reduced and under attack.

episodes.title: I Want a Horse
episodes.plot: Realizing they need a horse to remove tree trunks, Thorfinn and Einar go to the stables. When the workers deny them a horse, they decide they must find another way to get one.

episodes.title: Iron Fist Ketil
episodes.plot: Thieves have been taking food secretly from Ketil's farm. Meanwhile, Ketil's eldest son Thorgil returns home.

episodes.title: An Empty Man
episodes.plot: Thorfinn has nightmares almost every night, but he can never remember what he dreamed about, a fact that bothers him.

episodes.title: Oath
episodes.plot: Thorfinn is caught off guard and knocked unconscious in a fight with the servants. In the midst of this, he had a dream in which he sees his father and his arch-enemy. How will they respond to the current state of Thorfinn?

episodes.title: Cursed Head
episodes.plot: Finally, after three long years, Einar and Thorfinn chop down the final tree in the forest. At the same time, Canute, who became the conqueror of England, is visiting Jelling, the royal capital of Denmark.

episodes.title: The King and the Sword
episodes.plot: With Canute's newfound additional throne and the land of Denmark, he aims to fund his armies with drastic means. Ketil meets with Lief Ericson who finds out he has a slave named Thorfinn. Ketil pays tribute to the new king Canute.

episodes.title: For the Love That Was Lost
episodes.plot: Olmar recieves some upsetting news, causing him to reach his breaking point. Meawhile, tensions arise as Canute sets his sights on Ketil's farm.

episodes.title: Dark Clouds
episodes.plot: A slave kills his master and all his sons, as a result, a bounty amounting to three horses is placed on his head. The old master collapses tending the field and must be taken care of due to his poor health.

episodes.title: Freedom
episodes.plot: Gardar, the runaway slave who killed his master has come to Ketil's farmstead to free Arnheid, his wife. Snake aims to subdue Gardar while Einar wishes to aid Gardar by violent means, Thorfinn, however, pursues a diplomatic solution.

episodes.title: Storm
episodes.plot: Arnheid goes to the fortress where Gardar is imprisoned and asks to see her husband to treat his wounds.

episodes.title: Cause
episodes.plot: Having realized Gardar is escaped, Einar and Thorfinn make their way to the old master's home to find Arnheid. The two find her and both decide to help her and her husband escape, with the three colluding in a plan to help save Gardar.

episodes.title: Way Home
episodes.plot: Thorfinn, after being left with no other choice, resorts to using violence to defend Gardar from Snake.

episodes.title: The First Measure
episodes.plot: As Canute and his men are approaching the farm, Ketil returns home and learns about the events that occurred while he was gone.

episodes.title: War at Ketil's Farm
episodes.plot: Ketil gathers men to fight and defend his farm from the King's forces. Meanwhile, Thorfinn and his friends try to escape with Arnheid before the battle ends.

episodes.title: Pain
episodes.plot: As Thorfinn and Einar head for their escape, Arnheid regains consciousness and asks where they are going and if there are slaves and wars there, too.

episodes.title: Courage
episodes.plot: The battle has left heartbreaking casualties in its wake. Though Thorgil and Ketil's wife want to continue the fight, Canute demands their surrender.

episodes.title: Emperor of Rebellion
episodes.plot: Thorfinn is determined to face the brutal challenge of having to endure one hundred punches in order to speak with Canute. His father's words resonate with him as he undergoes this brutal but necessary task.

episodes.title: Two Paths
episodes.plot: Thorfinn and Canute attempt to begin to engage in peace discussions for Ketil's farmland.

episodes.title: Episode #2.24
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.
